metadata.title: CVE-2020-27797 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory address reference was discovered in the elf_lookupfunction in p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 4.0.0 via a crafted Mach-O file.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
